info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 3:56PM EDT until July 17 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Alexander County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northwestern Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Taylorsville, or near Love Valley, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Taylorsville, Stony Point, Love Valley, Vashti, Hiddenite and Union Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
